member.name: N:Bing.Maps
member.summary: The Bing.Maps namespace contains the most commonly used classes of the Bing Maps API.

member.name: T:Bing.Maps.Location
member.summary: Contains the coordinate values of a location on the map.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with latitude and longitude values set to 0,0.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified latitude and longitude values.

member.summary: Creates a copy of the specified .

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Location.Latitude
member.summary: Gets or sets the latitude of the location as degrees of latitude.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Location.Longitude
member.summary: Gets or sets the longitude of the location as degrees of longitude.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Location.NormalizeLongitude(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts a longitude value in degrees to be in the range [-180,180].

member.summary: Gets the number of elements in the collection.

member.summary: Appends the specified location to the end of the collection.

member.summary: Clears all locations from the collection.

member.summary: Returns the first location in the collection.

member.summary: Returns the location at the specified index in the collection.

member.summary: Populates items with LocationCollection elements starting at the specified index. Returns the number of items.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.LocationCollection.GetView
member.summary: Returns a view of the collection.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.LocationCollection.IndexOf(Bing.Maps.Location,default.uint32)
member.summary: Populates index with the index of the specified location within the collection.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.LocationCollection.InsertAt(default.uint32,Bing.Maps.Location)
member.summary: Inserts the specified location at the given index.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.LocationCollection.RemoveAt(default.uint32)
member.summary: Removes the location found at the specified index in the collection.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.LocationCollection.RemoveAtEnd
member.summary: Removes the last location in the collection.

member.summary: Replaces the locations in the collection with the specified items.

member.summary: Set the location to the specified index.

member.summary: Determines whether the collection contains a specific location.

member.summary: Copies the locations of a collection to an array, starting at a particular array index.

member.summary: Determines the index of a specific location in the collection.

member.name: T:Bing.Maps.Map
member.summary: Represents a map. This class inherits from the Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Control class.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.Bounds
member.summary: Gets a rectangle that defines the map view.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.Center
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the center of the map.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.Children
member.summary: Gets any UI elements that are children of the map control element.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.CopyrightPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the map copyright string.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.Culture
member.summary: Gets or sets the culture code to use.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.Credentials
member.summary: Gets or sets the map credentials used to authenticate the map.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.Heading
member.summary: Gets or sets the directional heading of the map. The heading is represented in geometric degrees with 0 or 360 = North, 90 = East, 180 = South, and 270 = West. You can set the heading by using the SetHeading method.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.HomeRegion
member.summary: Gets or sets the home region of the map.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.MapType
member.summary: Gets or sets the map type, or style.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.LogoPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the Bing Maps logo.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.PreloadArea
member.summary: Gets or sets how much map data beyond the current view to preload. On clients with limited bandwidth, this should be set to None.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.MetersPerPixel
member.summary: Gets the current scale in meters per pixel of the center of the current map view.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.RotationEnabled
member.summary: Gets whether map view rotation is enabled.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.ShapeLayers
member.summary: Gets a collection of the map’s shape layers.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.ShowScaleBar
member.summary:
Gets or sets whether the scale bar is visible.
Default value: true

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.ScaleBarPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the scale bar.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.ShowTraffic
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the scale bar is visible. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.ShowNavigationBar
member.summary:
Gets or sets whether to display map navigation controls.
The default value is true.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.ShowBuildings
member.summary:
Gets or sets whether to display building footprints.
The default value is true.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.ShowBreadcrumb
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to show a breadcrumb control. The breadcrumb control shows the current center location’s geography hierarchy. For example, if the location center is Seattle, the breadcrumb control displays “World . United States . WA”. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.ShowTraffic
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the scale bar is visible. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.SuppressNetworkRequests
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to suppress network requests.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.TargetBounds
member.summary: Gets the rectangle that defines the boundaries of the view to which the map is navigating.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.TargetCenter
member.summary: Gets the location of the center of the view to which the map is navigating.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.TargetHeading
member.summary: Gets the directional heading of the view to which the map is navigating.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.TargetZoomLevel
member.summary: Gets the zoom level of the view to which the map is navigating.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.TileLayers
member.summary: Gets a collection of the map’s tile layers.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.ZoomLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the zoom level of the map.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.VenueManager
member.summary: Gets the venue manager for the map.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.ViewRestriction
member.summary:
Gets or sets the restrictions for changing the map view.
The default value is ZoomOutToWholeWorld.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.MaxZoomLevel
member.summary: Gets the maximum zoom level for the map.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.Map.MinZoomLevel
member.summary: Gets the minimum zoom level for the map.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.GetCopyrightAsync
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous operation to get the copyright string for the current view. The copyright string contains one or more lines of text separated by a carriage return and line feed.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.GetSessionIdAsync
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous operation to get the session ID.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.LocationToPixel(Bing.Maps.Location)
member.summary: Returns an exception if the specified location was not successfully converted to a map screen pixel. This method will work on locations that are not currently in view and will return values outside of the visible map area in the range (0,0) to (ActualWidth,ActualHeight).

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.PixelToLocation(Windows.Foundation.Point)
member.summary: Returns an exception if the specified map screen pixel was not successfully converted to a location. This method will work on locations that are not currently in view.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.SetHeading(System.Double)
member.summary:
Sets the directional heading of the map. The heading is represented in geometric degrees with 0 or 360 = North, 90 = East, 180 = South, and 270 = West.
Make sure the RotateEnabled is set to true before trying to change the map heading.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.SetHeading(System.Double,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary:
Sets the directional heading of the map as well as the animation duration. If you do not want the view change to animate, set the animation duration to MapAnimationDuration.None.
Make sure the RotateEnabled is set to true before trying to change the map heading.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.SetView(Bing.Maps.Location)
member.summary: Sets the map view using the specified center location. The view change will be animated.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.SetView(Bing.Maps.Location,System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the map view using the specified center location and zoom level. The view change will be animated.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.SetView(Bing.Maps.Location,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the map view using the specified center location, zoom level, and heading. The view change will be animated.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.SetView(Bing.Maps.Location,System.Double,System.Double,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the map view using the specified center location, zoom level, heading, and animation time. If you do not want the view change to animate, set the animation duration to MapAnimationDuration.None..

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.SetView(Bing.Maps.Location,System.Double,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the map view using the specified center location, zoom level, and animation duration. If you do not want the view change to animate, set the animation duration to MapAnimationDuration.None.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.SetView(Bing.Maps.Location,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the map view using the specified center location, and specifies the animation duration. If you do not want the view change to animate, set the animation duration to MapAnimationDuration.None.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.SetView(Bing.Maps.LocationRect)
member.summary: Sets the map view using the specified geographical region.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.SetView(Bing.Maps.LocationRect,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the map view using the specified geographical region and animation duration. If you do not want the view change to animate, set the animation duration to MapAnimationDuration.None.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.SetZoomLevel(System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the zoom level of the map view to the specified value.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.SetZoomLevel(System.Double,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the zoom level of the map view and the animation time. If you do not want the view change to animate, set the animation duration to MapAnimationDuration.None.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.SetZoomLevelAroundPoint(System.Double,Windows.Foundation.Point,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the zoom level of the map view to the specified value while maintaining the screen position of the given point. You can also specify an animation time for the view change. If you do not want the view change to animate, set the animation duration to MapAnimationDuration.None. If you want to use the default animation time, set the animation duration to MapAnimationDuration.Default.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.TryLocationsToPixels(Bing.Maps.LocationCoollection,System.Collections.Generic.IList<Windows.Foundation.Point>)
member.summary: Returns a bool indicating whether the specified location was successfully converted to a map screen pixel. This method will work on locations that are not currently in view and will return values outside of the visible map area in the range (0,0) to (ActualWidth,ActualHeight).

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.TryPixelToLocation(Windows.Foundation.Point,Bing.Maps.Location@)
member.summary: Returns a bool indicating whether the specified point was successfully converted to a location. This method will work on locations that are not currently in view.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.Map.TryPixelToLocation(Windows.Foundation.Point,Bing.Maps.Location@)
member.summary: Returns a bool indicating whether the specified point was successfully converted to a location. This method will work on locations that are not currently in view.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.CopyrightChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the copyright of the map changes.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a map property changes.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.TargetViewChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the view towards which the map is navigating changes.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.TileDownloadCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when all of the map tiles of the map view have downloaded.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.TileServersAvailabilityChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the connection to the tile servers is lost or restored.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.ViewChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the map view changes. This event is raised for every frame of the map view change.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.MapStyleChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the map style changes. This event is raised for every frame of the map view change.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.ViewChangeEnded
member.summary: Occurs when the map view is done changing. This event occurs when a view is the same for one frame of a map view change.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.ViewChangeStarted
member.summary: Occurs when the map view starts changing.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.DoubleTappedOverride
member.summary: Occurs when an otherwise unhandled DoubleTap interaction occurs over the hit test area of the map.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.KeyDownOverride
member.summary: Occurs when a keyboard key is pressed while the map has focus.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.KeyUpOverride
member.summary: Occurs when a keyboard key is released while the map has focus.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.PointerCanceledOverride
member.summary: Occurs when a pointer that made contact abnormally loses contact.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.PointerCaptureLostOverride
member.summary: Occurs when the map view starts changing.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.PointerEnteredOverride
member.summary: Occurs when a pointer enters the hit test area of the map.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.PointerExitedOverride
member.summary: Occurs when a pointer leaves the hit test area of the map.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.PointerMovedOverride
member.summary: Occurs when a pointer moves while the pointer remains within the hit test area of the map.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.PointerPressedOverride
member.summary: Occurs when the pointer device initiates a Press action within the map.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.PointerReleasedOverride
member.summary: Occurs when the pointer device that previously initiated a Press action is released, while within the map.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.PointerWheelChangedOverride
member.summary: Occurs when the delta value of a pointer wheel changes.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.Map.TappedOverride
member.summary: Occurs when an otherwise unhandled Tap interaction occurs over the hit test area of the map.

member.name: T:Bing.Maps.MapLayer
member.summary: Represents a map layer, which can contain elements positioned on the map. Map layers can be nested. This class inherits from Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Control.Panel.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets the PositionAnchor dependency property.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.MapLayer.PositionProperty
member.summary: Gets the Position dependency property.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.MapLayer.GetPosition(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Returns the position of a dependency object. This value is used to position a UIElement when it is a child of a Map or a MapLayer within a Map.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.MapLayer.GetPositionAnchor(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Returns the position anchor of a dependency object.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.MapLayer.SetPosition(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject,Bing.Maps.Location)
member.summary: Sets the position of a specified dependency object. This value is used to position a UIElement that is a child of a Map or a MapLayer within a Map.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.MapLayer.SetPositionAnchor(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject,Windows.Foundation.Point)
member.summary: Sets the position anchor of a dependency object. This attached property is then used to position the element in a Map or MapLayer that is a child of a Map. The position anchor defaults to 0,0 which means the element will have its top-left position aligned with the Position value. For a round pushpin this should be set to (Width / 2, Height / 2) to center the element over its Position.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.MapTileLayer.MinZoomLevel
member.summary:
Gets or sets the minimum zoom level to display in the tile layer.
The default value is 1.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.MapTileLayer.MaxZoomLevel
member.summary:
Gets or sets the maximum zoom level to display in the tile layer.
The default value is 20.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.MapTileLayer.Opacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the opacity of the tile layer, defined by a double between 0 (not visible) and 1.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.MapTileLayer.TileSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL that defines the source of the tiles.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.MapTileLayer.Visible
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the tile layer is shown.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.MapTileLayer.ZIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the z-index of the tile layer with respect to other items on the map.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.MapTileLayer.GetTileUri
member.summary:
Occurs when a map tile is requested and returns the map tile URL.
Do not use this callback event function if you are using the TileSource property.

member.name: E:Bing.Maps.MapTileLayer.TileDownloadCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when the all map tiles for the current view are downloaded.

member.name: T:Bing.Maps.MapTileLayerCollection
member.summary: Contains a collection of objects.

member.name: M:Bing.Maps.MapTileLayerCollection.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Bing.Maps.MapViewRestriction
member.summary:
Defines restrictions on the map view.
When the map is zoomed out to a high level, it is possible to see more than one instance of the world map unless you restrict the view to one world map.

member.name: F:Bing.Maps.MapViewRestriction.MapOnly
member.summary: The map view can display multiple world maps.

member.name: F:Bing.Maps.MapViewRestriction.None
member.summary: The map view has no restrictions.

member.name: F:Bing.Maps.MapViewRestriction.OneWorldOnly
member.summary: The map view can only display one world map.

member.name: F:Bing.Maps.MapViewRestriction.ZoomOutToWholeWorld
member.summary: The map view can be zoomed out to display one or more world maps.

member.name: T:Bing.Maps.MapType
member.summary: Defines the type or style of the map.

member.name: F:Bing.Maps.MapType.Road
member.summary: The map displays road imagery.

member.name: F:Bing.Maps.MapType.Aerial
member.summary: The map displays aerial imagery.

member.name: F:Bing.Maps.MapType.Birdseye
member.summary: The map displays bird's eye imagery.

member.name: F:Bing.Maps.MapType.Empty
member.summary: The map does not display any imagery. Use this option if you want to display custom imagery instead of Bing Maps imagery.

member.name: T:Bing.Maps.MapAddress
member.summary: Represents an address on the map.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.MapAddress.AddressLine
member.summary: Gets the official street line of an address relative to the area, as specified by the Locality, or PostalCode, properties. Typical use of this element would be to provide a street address or any official address.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.MapAddress.AdminDistrict
member.summary: Gets a string specifying the subdivision name in the country or region for an address. This element is typically treated as the first order administrative subdivision, but in some cases it is the second, third, or fourth order subdivision in a country, dependency, or region.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.MapAddress.AdminDistrict2
member.summary: Gets a string specifying the subdivision name in the country or region for an address. This element is used when there is another level of subdivision information for a location, such as the county.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.MapAddress.CountryRegion
member.summary: Gets a string specifying the country or region name of an address.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.MapAddress.CountryRegionCode
member.summary: Gets the ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 country code for the country.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.MapAddress.Locality
member.summary: Gets a string specifying the populated place for the address. This typically refers to a city, but may refer to a suburb or a neighborhood in certain countries.

member.name: P:Bing.Maps.MapAddress.PostalCode
member.summary: Gets a string specifying the post code, postal code, or ZIP Code of an address.
